text: Bicuiba is a monotypic genus of flowering plants in the nutmeg family, Myristicaceae. The only species is Bicuiba oleifera, which is endemic to southeastern Brazil. It grows in the forests of the Atlantic coast.de Wilde, W. J. J. O. 1998. Bicuiba oleifera. In: IUCN 2013. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2013.1. Downloaded on 23 July 2013. ==References== Category:Myristicaceae genera Category:Monotypic magnoliid genera Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
